title: MS (Multiple sclerosis)
description: Yoga therapy intertwines the ancient wisdom of yoga and Ayurveda with modern science, taking an active part in healing, health and well-being through the practice of yoga.Yoga therapy is an ancient healing art that is supported by modern biomedical peer-reviewed research and practice based on evidence. MS is a progressive disease of the central nervous system, for which there is no cure in medicine at present. It is true that no medication can control consciousness and nervous system, create and distribute bioenergy to the necessary parts of the brain and body. Yoga therapy, as the science of controlling nervous and bioenergetic system, restores control of these.
